comment: - Trying to play videos conforming to the required parameters routinely produces a, 'Cannot play' message - whilst on another occasion the same video might well play. Additionally this app is impaired by the absence of a standalone option. - Quite surprising really that it seems there's no satisfactory Wear video player to be had anywhere.

author: Antoine Dispas
comment: Very disappointing. Once it loads there is a black screen with only the audio playing. Video does not work. Please fix.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please report your bug to support@appfour.com. We would like to look into it but might need more information.

author: Robert Rivera
comment: It Really works highly recommended! Stereo sound

author: Mohammad Rafiq
comment: Nokia very nice mobile phone

author: Prince Fall That Way
comment: It has a lot to be desired but all and all nothing out there better

author: Gidell Palos
comment: Great that it lets you view videos but it always stops after a min or 2 into running the video. Please fix this so we can give it a five. Or advise on what to do if its just a certain setting that can be adjusted.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content:
Hi,

please contact our support team to report this issue. Thank you. (support@appfour.com)

author: Prithviraj Singh Gohil
comment: We cannot track videos. Everytime we start, it starts from the beginning. There's no way to fast forward to last point you watched. Kindly fix this.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: We will look into it, thank you for your feedback.

comment: Please contact me I have a unauthorized transaction

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please contact Google Play support. The developers are not able to investigate, since we have no insight in the transaction details.

author: Shihab K
comment: Great App. Request the app creators to build the same set of apps for gear S3.

author: Steve Costello
comment: Nice app to review your videos on Instagram videos take the full screen of the watch which is very nice but they can be a little laggy other videos on my phone seem to run fine if you want to watch your videos on your smartwatch I believe this is your only acting it got it for $9.99 and a bundle of about 10 apps which is a good price

author: Zedrick Costuna
comment: Why i cant fast forward the videos !.. I cannot able to play the movie again when im tryin to forward it can you please fix it,

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: We will look into it, thank you for your feedback. If this issue does not get solved with the next update please get in touch with support@appfour.com for help or refund.

comment: Won't load up on Fossil Q founder Gen 1 can't watch videos says you must update app even when it's up to date

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hello Luis, thank you for checking out our app. Please contact support@appfour.com for help with your issue.

author: Dr Nitesh Choudhary
comment: Improve connectivity

author: 9Hunnid Ali
comment: Ever since android wear update app does not work will not play videos at all and keeps saying update phone and app... Everything has been updated but still says it needs update?

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please try to re-install the app. Uninstall everything, restart your watch and download and install the smartwatch part directly from the Play Store on your watch. If your issues persist please contact support@appfour.com.

author: Wooly
comment: Doesn't work properly. unable to find videos on smartwatch.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: We are sorry for the inconvenience. Please send your bug report to support@appfour.com so we can look into this issue.

author: Jeff Boyack
comment: I purchased the premium version, my movies come up but theres no audio at all. Video only, no matter what I do, please help

reply.author: appfour
reply.content:
Hi Jeff,

we would need more information about the smartwatch model and Android Wear version you are using. If your smartwatch does not have speakers, please connect your Bluetooth device directly with your smartwatch (not the phone). FOr further assistance please contact support@appfour.com. Thank you.

author: Md Afsar
comment: Recently I purchased the pro version of the app,I found this app very unstable.Everytime I open the app on my Fossil Q Founder it can't even play videos properly sometimes it hangs and sometimes stops inbetween.What is the use of this unstable app.I want my money back as soon as possible.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please send your request to support@appfour.com. Our support will help here.

comment: Really glad I purchased! I like the new updates, ability to hide folders is perfect :D

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you. :)

comment: It charged me and never gave me the paid version of the app.. would like a refund..

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please restart your smartwatch and if this does not solve the issue please contact support@appfour.com for help or refund.

author: kyle clauson
comment: Great apps ... Great support!

author: Scorpion King
comment: Love it

author: sharif s
comment: It works well but the only problem is.. The "Get Full version" icon blocks half the screen. You can't hide it.

author: Stuart Maginnis
comment: I paid for the suite of apps from appfour for my smart watch on a different phone.  I'm trying to get set up for a new phone and is asking me to pay again. I have the email from original purchase.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Stuart, this is a known Google issue. Please make sure the app you bought the bundle with is installed and restart your device. You can contact support@appfour.com any time for more information and help.

comment: 1/4 of screen cover by ads

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: The full version will completely remove ads. If you have any further questions, suggestions or feedback ... or even new app ideas, please do not hesitate to get in contact with us via support@appfour.com. Thank you.

author: Charles Griffin
comment: It worked for a while then stopped.  Now it shows me the videos,  but when I click to view it,  it say can not view video

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please contact support@appfour.com and let us know more about the devices you are using. Did it stop working after the last update?

author: tony ceci
comment: I have to revise my below review (was 4 stars) after an update now their logo/symbol blocks 25% of the screen! There is still no titles available so you have no idea what video you are going to play. I hope they release an app that allows you to stream music from your phone (instead of downloading like most apps) then i wont care if their logo is on the screen, but you still need to see the title of the file and not the length.   This is a great app and allows you to STREAM videos loaded on your phone, let me repeat that, stream them, meaning you dont have to download the video to your watch. Now let me ask you, and the devolopers this VITAL question. HOW COME THERE ARE NO APPS THAT LET YOU STREAM MUSIC TO YOUR WATCH? These developers should add streaming audio playback to this app, or design a 2nd. The only issue i have with this app is that it does not list titles from the video tracks so you have no idea what your playing until it starts. If it listed titles it would get 5 stars easy

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you for your suggestion, we will consider it. :)

author: Edward C Rog
comment: It would be perfect if you could watch the full video and not cut off after a short while

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: This should not happen, please try to re-install the app and send a message to support@appfour.com if this does not solve the issue. Thank you.

author: Nunya Fukin Bizzness
comment: All your apps crash quite regularly... And if you spent more time fixing your apps people would want to get them and ya wouldnt have to put ads for your apps in every app you make.

author: Bryan Luna
comment: Doesn't work at all on my LG sport I'm able to connect from my LG V20 but nothing shows up on my watch, would love to use this please fix!!

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please contact support@appfour.com for help.

author: James Smith
comment: I know you want me to upgrade , but spamming a button in my face as im watching something is just annoying and instead of making me upgrade it makes me want to uninstall the bloody app!

author: Haris Ghazali Sabtu
comment: Was working before until the latest update..  now only loading when try to open the apps.. loading and stuck.. please check ur email.. thanks.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please check out our latest version, the issues should be solved. If you still have problems please contact support@appfour.com. Thank you.

author: Shahazadh Sadhiq
comment: I bought the full version so that I can access all videos on phone . I use a huawei smartwarch .Now I cannot play full video as the player gets stuck after  2 minutes .I uninstalled and reinstalled the application but still the same result .Please fix this issue or otherwise refund my money back.   Now the video gallery is not working at all .I had emailed the bug report to your team but till now one replied back.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hello. We replied to all your emails and as said in those we are currently investigating your problem. We are thankful for your report and help in this matter. :) Edit: Please check out our new version and let us know if your issues got solved.

author: Joseph McFadden
comment: No features.  Can't fast forward.  Can't seek.  All this does is play.  I Need more features to give you 5 stars for a 3 dollar app.  All features should be free until the bugs are ironed out and more features are added.  Also you can't get your money back because the full version is an in-app instead of a different app.  Also,  once the app freezes,  it won't play again until you restart your watch.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please contact support@appfour.com for help or refund. We appreciate all bug reports as well and are constantly working on improvements.

title: Paid for flat rate, video does not work properly

reply.content: You do not have to pay twice. Normally a restart of the smartwatch solves the problem. If not please contact support@appfour.com.

title: Wait.. Where is me money?
